00030         CPluginShadow::~CPluginShadow()
00031         {
00032                 LogTrace("[Shutdown] Unloading shadow: %s", mPluginName.c_str());
00033 
00034                 std::for_each(mExtensions.begin(), mExtensions.end(), boost::mem_fn(&IUnknown::Release));
00035                 std::for_each(mExtensionPoints.begin(), mExtensionPoints.end(), boost::mem_fn(&IUnknown::Release));
00036         }
00037

00040         void CPluginShadow::FinalConstruct(const std::string &pluginName, int version)
00041         {
00043                 mVersion = version;
00044                 mPluginName = pluginName;
00045                 mModuleName = pluginName + ".dll";
00046         }

00050         module::HResult CPluginShadow::CreateInstance(const module::guid &clsid, const module::guid &riid, void **ppv)
00051         {
00052                 if(!mModule.IsLoaded())
00053                 {
00054                         module::HResult hr = LoadModule();
00055                         if(SF_FAILED(hr)) return hr;
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 module::HResult hr = create_instance(ppv, riid, clsid, mModule);
00059                 if(SF_FAILED(hr))
00060                 {
00061                         LogWarningAlways("CreateInstance request failed, target: %s", mPluginName.c_str());
00062                 }
00063                 return hr;
00064         }
00065

00068         module::HResult CPluginShadow::CreateInstance(const module::guid &riid, void **ppv)
00069         {
00070                 if(!mModule.IsLoaded())
00071                 {
00072                         module::HResult hr = LoadModule();
00073                         if(SF_FAILED(hr)) return hr;
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 module::HResult hr = create_instance(ppv, riid, mModule);
00077                 if(SF_FAILED(hr))
00078                 {
00079                         LogWarningAlways("CreateInstance request failed, target: %s", mPluginName.c_str());
00080                 }
00081                 return hr;
00082         }

00085 
00086         module::HResult CPluginShadow::LoadModule()
00087         {
00088                 LogTrace("Loading plugin module: %s", mModuleName.c_str());
00089 
00090                 module::HResult hr = mModule.Init(mModuleName.c_str());
00091                 if(SF_FAILED(hr)) return hr;
00092                 return static_cast<CPluginManager*>(gEnv->PluginManager)->OnPluginLoad(this);
00093         }

00097         void CPluginShadow::Shutdown()
00098         {
00099                 LogTrace("[Shutdown] Shadow shutdown: %s", mPluginName.c_str());
00100                 mModule.Shutdown();
00101         }

00105         bool CPluginShadow::Exports(const module::guid &clsid)
00106         {
00107                 return mExportTable.find(clsid) != mExportTable.end();
00108         }

00111 
00112         bool CPluginShadow::Provides(const std::string &expoint)
00113         {
00114                 return FindExtensionPoint(expoint) != 0;
00115         }
00116 
00118 
00119         bool CPluginShadow::Extends(const std::string &expoint)
00120         {
00121                 for(std::vector<IExtension*>::const_iterator it = mExtensions.begin();
00122                         it != mExtensions.end(); ++it)
00123                         if((*it)->ExtensionPoint()->UniqueID() == expoint) return true;
00124                 return false;
00125         }
00126 
00128 
00129         IExtensionPoint* CPluginShadow::FindExtensionPoint(const std::string &name)
00130         {
00131                 for(std::vector<IExtensionPoint*>::const_iterator it = mExtensionPoints.begin();
00132                         it != mExtensionPoints.end(); ++it)
00133                         if((*it)->ID() == name) return *it;
00134                 return 0;
00135         }
